annonstext:
Are you curious and passionate about the art of verification and validation and have a systematic way of approaching problems? Then this role will be a great match for you!

Your role as Verification, validation & test development engineer
The team is now looking to grow and strengthen the department with experienced engineers. As a Test Engineer at Embedded Systems, you will be a part of our customers missions to drive the technology shift within their respective fields - electrification, machine learning and wireless communication to name a few. Depending on your background and ambition the role may vary from test development or test automation, to test and verification leader. Someone who enjoys working in the borderland between software and hardware will excel in this role.

Your Future Team 
The Embedded Systems department is part of an established top tier consultancy firm that helps its customers to excel their research and development and achieve their full potential. We are looking for driven, curious engineers to join our skilled team within software and hardware development, test development and automation as well algorithm development, machine learning and AI. We love to work with the latest technology and always want to pursue new endeavors.

 

Who we are looking for:
• Loves Python programming
• +2 years of relevant working experience
• Strong analytical abilities
• Fluent in English, writing and speaking
• M. Sc. in an Engineering discipline.
• A genuine interest in the testing of hardware and software solutions

Meriting:
• Experience from working with Linux systems
• Experience from Pytest
• ISTQB certification
• Experience of wireless communication
• Experience from automotive industry
• Proficiency in the Swedish language

Some more about you:
You are a team player with the ability to drive the technical development forward and a great communicator. At ALTEN you are appreciated for your ability to see the big picture, your theoretical knowledge and practical experience and for your willingness to share these with your co-workers.

About ALTEN
ALTEN is a global consulting company that delivers expertise for world-leading companies. We are located in over 30 countries and have more than 37 000 employees.

In Sweden, we have over 1 800 employees and offices in twelve locations across the country. Our clients are found in industries such as Automotive, Energy, Telecom, Industry, Aerospace & Defense and Life Science.

Benefits
Work life balance is our top priority. A very appreciated benefit is our Work Life Balance Days, which are off-days complimentary provided by the company throughout the year to promote a healthy work life. We also have a collective agreement and other benefits like Pension, Insurances and Wellness grants.

We look forward to your application!
